archdesc.runner: Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: For his Ph.D. in Public Policy, Ron Fraser wrote a dissertation on the reauthorization of the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act (ISTEA) of 1991. The materials in this collection come from his dissertation research and include 44 microcassette audiotapes, transcriptions, and 5.25" floppy disks of interviews with upper-level transportation officials.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: There are no restrictions on personal use. Permission to publish material from the Ron Fraser papers must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, George Mason University Libraries.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Ron Fraser papers, C0071, Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Collection donated by Ron Fraser in 2005.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Special Collections and Archives staff. EAD markup completed by Eron Ackerman and Jordan Patty in August 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Ron Fraser holds a Ph.D. in Public Policy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: For his Ph.D. in Public Policy, Ron Fraser wrote a dissertation on the reauthorization of the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act (ISTEA) of 1991. The materials in this collection come from his dissertation research and include interstate highway planning reports as well as 44 microcassette audiotapes, transcriptions, and 5.25" floppy disks of interviews with dozens of upper-level transportation officials. Among the interviewees are Sarah Campbell, former Surface Transportation Policy Project Director; International Transportation Policy Consultant Alan E. Pisarski; Federal Highway Administration (FHWA) Deputy Chair Edward Kussy; Kevin E. Heanue, Director of Environment and Planning for the FHWA; and William Roberts, Legislative Director for the Environmental Defense Fund.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Special Collections and Archives holds many other transportation related collections.

controlaccess.head: Corporate Names:
controlaccess.corpname: American Association of State Highway and Transportation Officials.
American Road and Transportation Builders Association.
